definition: Evergreen (Group), Taiwan-based shipping and transportation conglomerate

sentences.english: Roundtrip economy class air ticket HKG/TPE/HKG by Eva Airways (BR).
sentences.chinese: 長榮航空往返香港及臺北經濟客位機票乙張。

sentences.english: Roundtrip Economy class air ticket for Hong Kong and Taipei on BR.
sentences.chinese: 長榮航空公司來回香港至臺北經濟客位機票。

sentences.english: It also has lots of evergreen trees so, not surprisingly, it is the Evergreen State.
sentences.chinese: 它也有很多這樣的常綠樹木，毫不奇怪，這是長榮國。

sentences.english: Shao Changrong, the famous expert of TCM, can use triple warmer separating therapy to treat turbid phlegm cough.
sentences.chinese: 名中醫邵長榮教授應用三焦辨證法治療痰濁咳嗽。

sentences.english: His youngest son, Chang Kuo-wei, is president of EVA Air.
sentences.chinese: 他的小兒子張國煒則擔任長榮航空董事長。

sentences.english: New Castle is not the old two-shou, a green Evergreen world.
sentences.chinese: 青山不老雙新壽，綠水長榮一世人。

sentences.english: Taiwan's Evergreen Group Products produced the "steel-wing", a product certificate.
sentences.chinese: 產品是臺灣長榮集團出品的“榮鋼”，有產品證明書。

definition: domestic flight/internal line (air, train, ferry etc)

pinyin: Ao4 men2 Guo2 ji4 Ji1 chang3

definition: Air China (abbr. for 中國國際航空公司|中国国际航空公司[Zhong1 guo2 Guo2 ji4 Hang2 kong1 Gong1 si1])
Zuoying or Tsoying district of Kaohsiung city 高雄市[Gao1 xiong2 shi4], south Taiwan
